title: The New and Improved Nafta?
description:
On Monday, President Trump touted a brand new trade deal with Canada and Mexico that will put an end to Nafta. David Meyers speaks with Bloomberg's Josh Wingrove about the winners and losers in the new U.S.-Mexico-Canada Agreement. 
FOLLOW UP 
Josh's latest: Trump Lauds New Nafta Deal, Chides Tariff ‘Babies’
You can follow Josh at @josh_wingrove 
 
---- 
TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
itunes:author: Bloomberg
itunes:subtitle: with Josh Wingrove (Bloomberg News)
